# SQL Server MCP Server Project

This is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for SQL Server built with .NET 10, designed for use with Visual Studio 2026.

## Project Type
MCP Server for SQL Server database operations

## Technologies
- .NET 10
- Model Context Protocol (MCP)
- Microsoft.Data.SqlClient
- SQL Server

## Target IDE
Visual Studio 2026

## Features
- Execute SQL queries
- List database tables and schemas
- List stored procedures and functions
- Manage database connections
- Execute non-query commands
- Expose SQL Server functionality through MCP tools for Visual Studio 2026 AI features
